title: Don't do It, Coach O!
itunes:author: ESPN, Bomani Jones
itunes:subtitle: The Right Time: Ed Oregeron to "separate" from LSU, WFT messes up Sean Taylor's jersey retirement
content:encoded:
Bomani Jones shares his thoughts on the news that LSU and their head football coach Ed Orgeron will be “separating” following the conclusion of the season, and all of the wild stories behind the scenes that got us to this point (1:35). Plus, Washington fails to honor former DB Sean Taylor when they retire his number (26:58), an IYHH including why artificial intelligence could make cars "racist" (36:42) and your voicemails from when your parents embarrassed you (45:45)!


IYHH Stories

  1. @_theodorekim says AI Flaws could make your next car racist : https://lat.ms/3nmDuST
  2. @willoremus shares lawmakers’ latest idea to fix Facebook: regulate the algorithm: https://wapo.st/30ELCGz
  3. @jeremybmerrill says scammers are scooping up misspelled cryptocurrency URLs to rob your wallet: https://wapo.st/3pbA4Vt
